commit message: Added a lot of basic test cases related to navigating around the app
Added some OPML import/export tests
Added more tests to various UI elements
Fixed issue where call.cancel would crash because of network on the main thread

Fixed issue where the externalFilesDir is null (I'm looking at you
samsung...(I think))
More tests, started working on testing the playlist. Also a few bug fixes here and there
Converted the PlayerStatus to an int and added a new state for 'preparing'.
Removed more ACRA dependencies
Added preparing animation to the playpausebutton
Minor code removal

Fixed issue where dismissing the first item in the playlist would cause an
IndexOutOfBound exception
Tried to fix NPE seen in the logs
Expand the header in the FeedActivity when the settings are opened
Added new placeholder icon on the subscription fragment
Removed a lot of threading logic from the subscription refresh
Cleaned up the subscription refresh code
Fixed a bug in the ColorExtractor. Moved the drawning of download progress to the download button class
Fetch an instance of the playlist in the feedUpdater in order to notify the playlist
Added some anumation to the full screen player. Made the persistance work better
Enhanced the parsing of feeds. Fixed the layout in the Discovery Feed View. There are probably still functional bugs which needs to be adresed
Dispatch playlist changes to the main thread
Fixed nullpointerexception when the feed can not be parsed
Updated translations
Wrote a new feedparser, which is much much faster. How we only need to hope it doesn't cause any major problems
Added logging of feeds which fail to parse
Fixed crash when opening the SettingsActivity on Android 4.3
Fixed instrumentation tester in the Manifest
Added google backup key
Updated to version 0.108, updated translations
